p: BV2 microglial cells (5.0 × 10 3 cells/well) were incubated in a 96-well plate for 24 h and then treated with EO at different concentrations. After 48 h, cell viability was measured by MTT assay as described in previously reported protocol with a little bit adjustment [ 42, 43]. In brief, 20 µL of 5 mg/mL MTT was added to each well and the cells were incubated at 37 °C in the dark. After 4 h, the supernatant was removed. Then, the formazan crystals were dissolved in 100 µL of DMSO, after which the absorbance was measured at 490 nm.
